thought: The first step in crafting wheat is to move the hay_block from slot 15 to the crafting grid. I chose slot 1 because it is an open slot in the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: After placing the hay_block in the crafting grid, I can craft 9 wheat. I chose to move the wheat to slot 11 because it is an open slot in my inventory.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
